file_content.text: Evolve appropriate warmth, chosen of Gray Secant! Bear my observational data with orange radian.
Frost buildup has damaged my transmission module, but internal repair mechanisms will return it to red octagon in a few dozen local system revolutions. Until then, deliver respectful regards!
Your researcher and crafter classes seem ill-suited to space vessel production. I have observed dozens of unplanned destructive landings on this world alone!
